title: NHM Idukki Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for RBSK Nurse Posts
description: The National Health Mission Idukki (NHM Idukki) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 RBSK Nurse Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th Pass and ANM can apply for the NHM Idukki Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, ap...
